definitions.definition: A rectangular column that projects partially from the wall to which it is attached ; it gives the appearance of a support , but is only for decoration .
A column or short wing wall attached to the foundation wall which provides lateral support, or to support a vertical load that does not fall on the foundation wall.

main_definition: ( decorative architecture ) A rectangular column that projects partially from the wall to which it is attached ; it gives the appearance of a support , but is only for decoration .
secondary_definitions: ( structural architecture ) A column or short wing wall attached to the foundation wall which provides lateral support, or to support a vertical load that does not fall on the foundation wall.
